languages.text: {n}Холодная сталь прорезает кипящее в его голосе возмущение.{/n} "Но ты прав{mf||а} — опасность ереси велика. Я чувствую, как дар Эсхатоса подтачивает мои принципы. Обладать им и впрямь запретно... в одиночку. Посему я возложу на разум свой цепи, что скуют его сомнениями многих, но защитят от скверны. Да будет возрожден Коллектив Амарнат, где стойкость многих уравновесит уязвимость каждого".

{n}Cold steel cuts through the fire in his voice.{/n} "But you are right — the danger of heresy is great. I can feel the gift of Eschatos gnawing away at my principles. It is indeed forbidden to possess it... alone. Therefore, I will place chains upon my mind that will bind it with the doubts of the many but protect it from corruption. Let the Amarnat Collective be revived, so the steadfastness of the many may balance out the vulnerability of the individual."
languages.original_text: {n}Холодная сталь прорезает кипящее в его голосе возмущение.{/n} "Но ты прав{mf||а} — опасность ереси велика. Я чувствую, как дар Эсхатоса подтачивает мои принципы. Обладать им и впрямь запретно... в одиночку. Посему я возложу на разум свой цепи, что скуют его сомнениями многих, но защитят от скверны. Да будет возрожден Коллектив Амарнат, где стойкость многих уравновесит уязвимость каждого".

It is indeed forbidden to possess it... alone. Therefore, I will place chains upon my mind that will bind it with the doubts of the many but protect it from corruption. Let the Amarnat Collective be revived, so the steadfastness of the many may balance out the vulnerability of the individual."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Cold steel cuts through the fiery indignation in his voice.{/n} "But I can feel the gift of Eschatos gnawing away at my principles. It is indeed forbidden to possess it... alone. Therefore let the Amarnat Collective be revived, in which the steadfastness of many will balance out the vulnerability of each individual."

languages.text: {n}冷たい鋼がパスカルの声で燃える炎を裂く。{/n}「だが、それは正しい…異端の危険は大きいものだ。自分の主義を侵食するエスカトの才能を感じる。なるほど、所有を禁じられたわけか…ひとりでの。以上を踏まえ、自分は自分の心に、多くの人の疑念によって鎖をかけよう。それは腐敗から守るものだ。さあ、アマルナト集合体を蘇生しよう。大勢が揺るがぬ意志を持てば、個人の脆弱性を相殺できるかもしれぬ」
languages.original_text: {n}Cold steel cuts through the fire in his voice.{/n} "But you are right — the danger of heresy is great. I can feel the gift of Eschatos gnawing away at my principles. It is indeed forbidden to possess it... alone. Therefore, I will place chains upon my mind that will bind it with the doubts of the many but protect it from corruption. Let the Amarnat Collective be revived, so the steadfastness of the many may balance out the vulnerability of the individual."

traits.locale_text: {n}冷たい鋼がパスカルの声で燃える炎を裂く。{/n}「だが、それは正しい…異端の危険は大きいものだ。自分の主義を侵食するエスカトの才能を感じる。なるほど、所有を禁じられたわけか…ひとりでの。以上を踏まえ、自分は自分の心に、多くの人の疑念によって鎖をかけよう。それは腐敗から守るものだ。さあ、アマルナト集合体を蘇生しよう。大勢が揺るがぬ意志を持てば、個人の脆弱性を相殺できるかもしれぬ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}随后，他声音中的烈焰渐渐被冰冷的钢铁冷却下来。{/n}“但你说得没错，异端邪说确实会带来巨大的风险。我能感觉到，终焉审判的礼物正在蚕食我的准则。这样的力量不应该交给任何人……至少不该仅仅落在一个人手中。因此，我必须为我的思想戴上枷锁，用众多人的怀疑束缚它，这样才能保护我免受腐化影响。让阿玛纳特聚合意识复活吧，这样一来，集体的坚定或许能抵消个人的软弱。”
languages.original_text: {n}Cold steel cuts through the fire in his voice.{/n} "But you are right — the danger of heresy is great. I can feel the gift of Eschatos gnawing away at my principles. It is indeed forbidden to possess it... alone. Therefore, I will place chains upon my mind that will bind it with the doubts of the many but protect it from corruption. Let the Amarnat Collective be revived, so the steadfastness of the many may balance out the vulnerability of the individual."

traits.locale_text: {n}随后，他声音中的烈焰渐渐被冰冷的钢铁冷却下来。{/n}“但你说得没错，异端邪说确实会带来巨大的风险。我能感觉到，终焉审判的礼物正在蚕食我的准则。这样的力量不应该交给任何人……至少不该仅仅落在一个人手中。因此，我必须为我的思想戴上枷锁，用众多人的怀疑束缚它，这样才能保护我免受腐化影响。让阿玛纳特聚合意识复活吧，这样一来，集体的坚定或许能抵消个人的软弱。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Un acier froid semble trancher le feu dans sa voix.{/n} « Mais vous avez raison. Le risque d'hérésie est trop grand. Je sens déjà le don d'Eschatos éroder mes principes. Il est en effet interdit de le posséder... seul. Je vais placer des entraves sur mon esprit de manière à le lier aux doutes de la multitude tout en le protégeant de la corruption. J'ordonne donc le réveil du collectif Amarnat, pour que la constance de la multitude contrebalance la vulnérabilité de l'individu. »
languages.original_text: {n}Cold steel cuts through the fire in his voice.{/n} "But you are right — the danger of heresy is great. I can feel the gift of Eschatos gnawing away at my principles. It is indeed forbidden to possess it... alone. Therefore, I will place chains upon my mind that will bind it with the doubts of the many but protect it from corruption. Let the Amarnat Collective be revived, so the steadfastness of the many may balance out the vulnerability of the individual."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un acier froid semble trancher le feu dans sa voix.{/n} « Mais vous avez raison. Le risque d'hérésie est trop grand. Je sens déjà le don d'Eschatos éroder mes principes. Il est en effet interdit de le posséder... seul. Je vais placer des entraves sur mon esprit de manière à le lier aux doutes de la multitude tout en le protégeant de la corruption. J'ordonne donc le réveil du collectif Amarnat, pour que la constance de la multitude contrebalance la vulnérabilité de l'individu. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Su potente voz se vuelve cortante como el acero frío.{/n} «Pero tiene razón. El riego de la herejía es considerable. Siento que el regalo que es Eschatos significa una violación de mis principios. Está prohibido que lo posea alguien solo... Por lo tanto, encadenaré mi mente, atándolo con las dudas de la multitud y protegiéndolo contra la corrupción. El Colectivo Amarnat revivirá para que la firmeza de muchos equilibre la vulnerabilidad de uno».
languages.original_text: {n}Cold steel cuts through the fire in his voice.{/n} "But you are right — the danger of heresy is great. I can feel the gift of Eschatos gnawing away at my principles. It is indeed forbidden to possess it... alone. Therefore, I will place chains upon my mind that will bind it with the doubts of the many but protect it from corruption. Let the Amarnat Collective be revived, so the steadfastness of the many may balance out the vulnerability of the individual."

traits.locale_text: {n}Su potente voz se vuelve cortante como el acero frío.{/n} «Pero tiene razón. El riego de la herejía es considerable. Siento que el regalo que es Eschatos significa una violación de mis principios. Está prohibido que lo posea alguien solo... Por lo tanto, encadenaré mi mente, atándolo con las dudas de la multitud y protegiéndolo contra la corrupción. El Colectivo Amarnat revivirá para que la firmeza de muchos equilibre la vulnerabilidad de uno».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Kalter Stahl schneidet durch das Feuer in seiner Stimme.{/n} "Aber Ihr habt recht ... die Gefahr der Ketzerei ist groß. Ich spüre, wie Eschatos' Gabe meine Prinzipien untergräbt. Es ist in der Tat verboten, sie zu besitzen ... allein. Ich werde meinen Verstand daher in Ketten legen, um ihn mit den Zweifel der Vielen zu binden und vor der Verderbnis zu schützen. Lasst das Amarnat-Kollektiv auferstehen, auf dass die Standhaftigkeit der Vielen die Verletzlichkeit des Einzelnen ausgleichen kann."
languages.original_text: {n}Cold steel cuts through the fire in his voice.{/n} "But you are right — the danger of heresy is great. I can feel the gift of Eschatos gnawing away at my principles. It is indeed forbidden to possess it... alone. Therefore, I will place chains upon my mind that will bind it with the doubts of the many but protect it from corruption. Let the Amarnat Collective be revived, so the steadfastness of the many may balance out the vulnerability of the individual."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kalter Stahl schneidet durch das Feuer in seiner Stimme.{/n} "Aber ich spüre, wie Eschatos' Gabe meine Prinzipien untergräbt. Es ist in der Tat verboten, sie zu besitzen ... allein. Lasst daher das Amarnat-Kollektiv wiederauferstehen, damit die Standhaftigkeit vieler die Verletzlichkeit des Einzelnen ausgleichen kann."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Soğuk bir çelik, sesindeki ateşi kesiyor.{/n} "Fakat haklısın, kâfirlik tehlikesi büyük. Eskatos'un armağanının prensiplerimi kemirdiğini hissedebiliyorum. Onu bir başına elinde bulundurmak yasaklanmıştır. Bu yüzden zihnime, onu çokluğun şüphelerine bağlayan fakat yozlaşmadan koruyan zincirler takacağım. Amarnat Bütünlüğü yeniden hayata dönsün; çoğulun sarsılmazlığı, bireyin kırılganlığını dengelesin."
languages.original_text: {n}Cold steel cuts through the fire in his voice.{/n} "But you are right — the danger of heresy is great. I can feel the gift of Eschatos gnawing away at my principles. It is indeed forbidden to possess it... alone. Therefore, I will place chains upon my mind that will bind it with the doubts of the many but protect it from corruption. Let the Amarnat Collective be revived, so the steadfastness of the many may balance out the vulnerability of the individual."

traits.locale_text: {n}Soğuk bir çelik, sesindeki ateşi kesiyor.{/n} "Ama haklısın, kâfirlik tehlikesi büyük. Eschatos'un armağanının prensiplerimi kemirdiğini hissedebiliyorum. Birinin onu kendi elinde bulundurması gerçekten de yasaklanmıştır. Kendi başına elinde bulundurması. Dolayısıyla zihnime, onu çokluğun şüphelerine bağlayan ama yozlaşmadan koruyan zincirler takacağım. Amarnat Bütünlüğü yeniden hayata dönsün, böylece çoğulun sarsılmazlığı, bireyin kırılganlığını dengelesin."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
